reviewTitle: This AMOLED Smartwatch is A Stylish and Feature Packed Companion
reviewDescription: The Boult 2.01 AMOLED smartwatch with crown is a fantastic option for those seeking a stylish and feature-rich wearable. Its standout features include:Stunning AMOLED Display: The vibrant AMOLED display is a real treat, offering excellent clarity and responsiveness. Elegant Design: The watch boasts a sleek and modern design, with the physical crown adding a touch of sophistication.  Comprehensive Health Tracking: It accurately monitors various health metrics, including heart rate, blood pressure, SpO2, and sleep patterns. Robust Fitness Features: The smartwatch is a fitness enthusiast's dream, with features like step tracking, multiple sports modes, and sedentary reminders.Long Battery Life: The battery life is impressive, allowing for several days of use on a single charge. Smooth Performance: The smartwatch operates smoothly and efficiently, with minimal lag or glitches. Value for Money: Considering its impressive features and stylish design, the Boult Smartwatch offers excellent value for money.

reviewDescription: just utube if u can't understand some new features settings or u can simply assist customer care service...

reviewTitle: Boult Crown - Nice watch and accurate sensors
reviewDescription: Don't buy the Crown Pro (black version) as that watch's app is buggy and not accurate. Does not sync well. This model is excellent! The sensors are accurate - I have measured BP with the watch and a professional machine and results were super close. Same with heart rate and O2. Although cannot be 100% relied on, I'm sure this would give a good idea when to consult a doctor for further medical advice. Highly recommend this watch. The Boult Fit app is nice and no bugs or issues. Smooth installation of the app and great features. Although would have expected some more customization on the watch faces, for this price, no complaints. Hopefully the smart watches can add blood sugar measurement in the future as well. Thanks Boult and Amazon. Don't buy from any other place. Amazon has great customer service and return/refund policy.
